headline: Workday Puts AI Agents Center Stage with Rock Stars Gwen Stefani, Paul Stanley, and Billy Idol
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, is bringing AI agents center stage in its latest "Rock Star" campaign featuring Gwen Stefani, Paul Stanley, and Billy Idol. The rockers, dressed in business attire, hilariously try to navigate the corporate world – refusing to believe that Workday's AI agents are making people "rock stars." The two new TV commercials, titled "Carmen the Rock Star," and "Goodnight Rock Stars," are debuting at The Masters from Ap
